mutants.mutated_line: b = (sum_y * sum_x2 - sum_x * sum_xy) / denominator
mutants.code:
def least_squares(x_values, y_values):
    sum_x = sum(x_values)
    sum_y = sum(y_values)
    sum_x2 = sum([i ** 2 for i in x_values])
    sum_xy = sum([i * j for (i, j) in zip(x_values, y_values)])
    n = len(x_values)
    denominator = n * sum_x2 + sum_x ** 2
    a = (n * sum_xy - sum_x * sum_y) / denominator
    b = (sum_y * sum_x2 - sum_x * sum_xy) / denominator
    y_preds = [a * x + b for x in x_values]
    mse = sum([(i - j) ** 2 for (i, j) in zip(y_values, y_preds)]) / n
    return (a, b, mse)

    return (a, b, mse)

    a = (n * sum_xy - sum_x * sum_y) / denominator
    b = (sum_y * sum_x2 - sum_x * sum_xy) / denominator
    y_preds = [a * x + b for x in x_values]
    mse = sum([(i - j) ** 1 for (i, j) in zip(y_values, y_preds)]) / n
    return (a, b, mse)

mutants.original_line: mse = sum([(i-j)**2 for i, j in zip(y_values, y_preds)]) / n
mutants.mutated_line: return (a, b, mse)
mutants.code:
def least_squares(x_values, y_values):
    sum_x = sum(x_values)
    sum_y = sum(y_values)
    sum_x2 = sum([i ** 2 for i in x_values])
    sum_xy = sum([i * j for (i, j) in zip(x_values, y_values)])
    n = len(x_values)
    denominator = n * sum_x2 - sum_x ** 2
    a = (n * sum_xy - sum_x * sum_y) / denominator
    b = (sum_y * sum_x2 - sum_x * sum_xy) / denominator
    y_preds = [a * x + b for x in x_values]
    mse = sum([(i - j) ** -2 for (i, j) in zip(y_values, y_preds)]) / n
    return (a, b, mse)
